class.name: MetaPlatformSDK_RosterOptions
class.brief_description: Represents options for launching the roster panel.
class.description: Represents options for launching the roster panel.

method.name: add_suggested_user
method.description: Adds a suggested user to the invitable users list. From the roster panel, the user can open the invite list, where the suggested users will be shown.

method.name: clear_suggested_users
method.description: Clear suggested users from the invitable users list.
